author: bhipinne

review: I bought an Apple TV a while back, and I like the video quality, the connectivity, and ease of setup...But I really do not like the very limited content on the Apple TV!Apple's business model seems to be that they just want to facilitate sales via iTunes,rather than provide a broad access to different content providers.Because of the lack of diversity of channels on the Apple TV, I switched to a Roku2,and then most recently to a Roku3!I have not touched or plugged in my Apple TV in a while, and should really sell it.I LOVE my Roku3, and can only recommend getting one -- forget the limited-content Apple TV.

review: Great new way to watch TV! It gives me programs that are exactly what I want, when i want it.
author: Kathleen Schuch

review: It's made by Apple so of course it's simple. The interface is very responsive, unlike many internet TVs and blu-ray players I've used. You can scroll quickly and accurately. Being able to play my iTunes movies on my TV is awesome. I now have an actually good reason to rent and buy movies on through Apple.Because it's a direct competitor, Amazon Prime is not available, but that's not the end of the world.

review: First my profile is home with 2 teenagers so the youtube features are  a big hit.  We now look here for "on demand" movies as the kids get itunes gift cards all the time.
